comment: Main body of text in vertical columns, written in traditional Chinese characters. The content discusses historical script evolution, particularly during the Qin dynasty, mentioning '大篆' (Great Seal Script), '小篆' (Small Seal Script), '隶书' (Clerical Script), and '八体' (Eight Scripts). The text includes annotations by scholars like 徐锴 (Xu Ke) and references to historical figures such as 王僧虔 (Wang Sengqian) and 班固 (Ban Gu).
